segments.text: Excuse me may I know the name of your corporation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: China National Textiles Import and Export Corporation
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We found your samples very attractive.We ' re interested in buying your garments if your prices are reasonable
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our products are of good quality.Since the prices of textiles have gone up in the world market we've had to increase them on some items by about ten percent.If you place a large order it is possible for us to cut down the prices by five percent
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have a reduction of seven percent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on how much you order
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I use the FAS terms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd rather use the CIF terms.You ' re welcome to come to talk about it in detail with your general manager and sign a contract .
segments.speaker: S2
